TunableList.name: AUTOMATED_RANDOMIZATION_LIST
TunableList.description: A mapping of the commodities used for determinisitc randomization. This is used by the automation system in the min spec perf tests.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The statistic we are operating on.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The number of times per loop to assign this to a Sim.

Tunable.name: AUTONOMY_DELAY_AFTER_USER_INTERACTION
Tunable.description: The amount of time, in sim minutes, before a sim that performs a user-direction interaction will run autonomy.

TunableList.name: FULL_AUTONOMY_ATTENTION_COST
TunableList.description: A curve that maps the total attention cost with a score multiplier. This value will be multiplied with the typical autonomy score to account for multi-tasking costs.

Tunable.name: x
Tunable.description: x component

Tunable.name: y
Tunable.description: y component

TunableTuple.name: FULL_AUTONOMY_DELAY
TunableTuple.description: Amount of time, in sim minutes, between full autonomy runs. System will randomize between min and max each time

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableTuple.name: FULL_AUTONOMY_DELAY_WITH_NO_PRIMARY_SIS
TunableTuple.display: Full Autonomy Delay With No Primary Sis
TunableTuple.description: The amount of time, in sim minutes, to wait before running autonomy if a sim is not in any primary SI's and hasn't run a user-directed action since AUTONOMY_DELAY_AFTER_USER_INTERACTION.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableTuple.name: FULL_AUTONOMY_DELAY_WITH_NO_RESULT
TunableTuple.display: Full Autonomy Delay With No Result
TunableTuple.description: The amount of time, in sim minutes, to wait before running autonomy if a sim's autonomy returned None.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: FULL_AUTONOMY_DESIRE_TO_JOIN_PLAYER_PARTIES
Tunable.display: Full Autonomy Desire To Join Player Parties
Tunable.description: This weight is multiplied with the affordance score if the target party has any sims that are not autonomous.

TunableList.name: FULL_AUTONOMY_INTERACTION_PRIORITY_RANKING
TunableList.description: Mapping to decide the order autonomous interaction will be chosen for full autonomy ping.

Tunable.name: FULL_AUTONOMY_MULTIPLIER_FOR_SOLVING_THE_SAME_STAT
Tunable.display: Full Autonomy Multiplier For Solving The Same Stat
Tunable.description: If a sim is currently solving a motive, this value will be multiplied into the commodity score of any other interactions. This will force sims to live with their decisions rather than always looking for the best thing.

TunableList.name: FULL_AUTONOMY_MULTITASKING_PERCENTAGE_BONUS
TunableList.description: A curve that maps the commodity desire score with a percentage bonus applied to the base multitasking chance.

Tunable.name: x
Tunable.description: x component

Tunable.name: y
Tunable.description: y component

Tunable.name: FULL_AUTONOMY_OPTIMISTIC_SCORE_THRESHOLD
Tunable.description: Before computing the routing distance to an object, we calculate an 'optimistic' score, which assumes that an object is right next to a Sim and won't invalidate any of their current interactions. If the optimistic score is lower than this fraction of the best scoring affordance so far the Sim will not bother estimating routing distance.

Tunable.name: FULL_AUTONOMY_STATISTIC_SCORE_VARIANCE
Tunable.description: The percentage variance that a statistic can have from the top stat before it is not considered for the first round of scoring.

Tunable.name: MAX_REAL_SECONDS_UNTIL_TIMESLICING_IS_REMOVED
Tunable.display: Max Real Seconds Until Timeslicing Is Removed
Tunable.description: The amount of time before autonomy stops timeslicing and forces the autonomy request to run unimpeded.

Tunable.name: NUMBER_OF_DUPLICATE_AFFORDANCE_TAGS_TO_SCORE
Tunable.display: Number Of Duplicate Affordance Tags To Score
Tunable.description: If an affordance is tuned with duplicate_affordance_group set to anything except INVALID, this is the number of affordances that share this tag that will be scored.

Tunable.name: OFF_LOT_OBJECT_SCORE_MULTIPLIER
Tunable.description: The autonomy score multiplier for off-lot object when a sim is on the active lot.

Tunable.name: POSTURE_CHANGE_OPPORTUNITY_COST_MULTIPLIER
Tunable.description: Multiplier to apply to the total opportunity cost of an aop when choosing that aop would force the Sim to change postures. This makes the concept of changing postures less attractive to Sims.

TunableList.name: SUBACTION_AUTONOMY_CONTENT_SCORE_UTILITY_CURVE
TunableList.display: Subaction Autonomy Content Score Utility Curve
TunableList.description: A curve that maps the content score to the provided utility.

Tunable.name: x
Tunable.description: x component

Tunable.name: y
Tunable.description: y component

TunableList.name: SUBACTION_GROUP_WEIGHTING
TunableList.description: Mapping of mixer interaction group tags to scores. This is used by subaction autonomy to decide which set of mixers to run. See the mixer_group entry in the sub_action tunable on any mixer for details as to how the system works.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The mixer group this score applies to.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The weight of this group.

Tunable.name: SUBACTION_MOTIVE_UTILITY_FALLBACK_SCORE
Tunable.description: If score for sub-action motive utility is zero, use this value as the best score.
